DOC.brief_summary: The goal study define 25 ( OH ) D3 catabolism CF patient use gold standard pharmacokinetics study . Specifically , investigator evaluate metabolic clearance 25 ( OH ) D3 among participant CF match control subject . The goal work provide first comprehensive characterization vitamin D metabolism CF patient promote novel hypothesis subsequent study .
